name: Stratigraphic patterns in slope minibasins
body: CSV files that contain surface (line) data for recreating the stratigraphic model cross sections shown in the following paper: Sylvester, Z., Cantelli, A., and Pirmez, C., 2015, Stratigraphic evolution of intraslope minibasins: Insights from surface-based model: AAPG Bulletin, v. 99, no. 6, p. 1099â€“1129, doi: 10.1306/01081514082.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
